#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
         int n;
        cin>>n;
       if(n%2==1)
        cout<<"0\n";
       else
       {
          int k=n/2;
           cout<<"9";
           for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++)
            cout<<"0";
           cout<<endl;
       }
    }
    return 0;
}
